details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.1.3 File trailer - ModDate
details.description: If a document information dictionary is present, it shall only contain a ModDate entry.

rule.description: If a document information dictionary is present, it shall only contain a ModDate entry.

error.message: Document information dictionary is present and contains %1 key(s), but allowed only ModDate
